籤詩版本二:
Musani ukuphulaphula intetho engenamsebenzi ngokulungileyo nokubi, kuba kusasa nangokuhlwa nisicengceleza isi-Ami kuphela.
Ukuba amagama asendle ayinyaniso, incwadi ethi "Indlela Yokuyeka Ukulamba" inegama elithi "jikelele", kwaye eli ligama elithi "ibhaso".
詩意:
Le hexagram imele uphawu lweekeyiki ukwanelisa indlala.
Yonke into ayinanto kwaye ayinanyani.
解曰: Ukuba ingqondo ayiqinisekanga, akuncedi nganto ukufunda izibhalo. Kanye njengekeyiki epeyintiweyo, ukutya kunzima ukuginya.
籤詩故事一:
◇Amazwi kaCao Cao malunga neeplum eziphelisa unxano
Ngexesha loBukumkani obuThathu, uCao Cao wayekhokela imikhosi yakhe.Kwakukho ukunqongophala kwamanzi ngexesha elomileyo kwaye amajoni ayenxaniwe.UCao Cao waxoka ukuba kukho ihlathi leplum ngaphambili, kwaye wayenokutya iiplums apho ukuze acime unxano lwakhe.
(Isaci esithi “ukujonga iintyatyambo iiplum ukuze sithobe unxano” sisuka apha. Sivumelana “nokupeyinta iikeyiki ukuze sinelise indlala”.
聖意: Thandazela ithamsanqa kwikhaya lakho (engathandekiyo), ithamsanqa kubutyebi (ungacingi ngako), ukuthengiselana okugudileyo (linda umzuzu), imiqobo emtshatweni (ukukhulelwa okungenanto), abahamba ngeenyawo, iintshulube zesilika kade, kungcono ukutyala imfuyo emithandathu kwangethuba, ingathandekiyo ekufumaneni abantu (kunzima), amatyala oluntu kwaye (ungonwabi) Ukufudukela kwelinye ilizwe kukulondoloza, ukulahleka kwempahla, izifo, kwaye kunqwenelela ithamsanqa kwiintaba namangcwaba.
古人: UCao Cao uthetha ngeeplums ezicima unxano lwakhe
